TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CngKeyBlobFormat extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat>
Public NotInheritable Class CngKeyBlobFormat Implements IEquatable(Of CngKeyBlobFormat)

summary.span: 指定搭配 Microsoft Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 物件使用的金鑰 BLOB 格式。

span.span: Specifies a key BLOB format for use with Microsoft Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是一個公用程式類別。The class is a utility class. 它包含靜態屬性、 比較方法和私用，在內部維護的指定金鑰 BLOB 格式名稱的字串。It consists of static properties, comparison methods, and a private, internally maintained string that specifies the key BLOB format name. 靜態屬性傳回物件。The static properties return objects. 每個物件的內部名稱會初始化為對應至靜態屬性的名稱的金鑰 BLOB 格式名稱。Each object's internal string name is initialized to the key BLOB format name that corresponds to the name of the static property. 您也可以使用這個類別來建立未涵蓋的靜態屬性的金鑰 BLOB 格式的物件。You can also use this class to create objects for key BLOB formats that are not covered by the static properties. 數個的 CNG 類別 (例如) 接受物件透過`format`參數。Several CNG classes (such as ) accept objects through a `format` parameter. 類別是當收到物件，它會擷取內嵌的金鑰 BLOB 格式名稱，藉由呼叫物件的屬性。When the class receives the object, it retrieves the embedded name of the key BLOB format by calling the object's property. 因此，做為已知的金鑰 BLOB 格式的列舉。Therefore, serves as an enumeration of well-known key BLOB formats. 它可讓您使用強型別的值，而非字串識別已知的金鑰 BLOB 格式。It lets you identify a well-known key BLOB format by using a strongly typed value instead of a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string format) cil managed

param.name: format
param.span: 要初始化的金鑰 BLOB 格式。

span.span: The key BLOB format to initialize.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式的主要目的是要提供任何方法來建立未表示的靜態屬性的格式類型的物件類別。The primary purpose of this constructor is to provide a method for creating objects for format types that are not represented by the static properties of the class. 此功能可讓未來[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]版本、 service pack 及協力廠商開發人員將新金鑰 BLOB 格式，您可以存取目前可用的金鑰 BLOB 格式一樣。This capacity allows future [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] releases, service packs, and third-party developers to add new key BLOB formats, which can be accessed just like the key BLOB formats that are currently available.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter length is 0 (zero).

summary.span: 取得 物件，指定橢圓曲線密碼編譯 (ECC) 金鑰的私密金鑰 BLOB，其中含有明確的曲線參數。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a private key BLOB for an elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) key which contains explicit curve parameters.

value.span: 描述私密金鑰 BLOB 的物件。

span.span: An object describing a private key BLOB.

summary.span: 取得 物件，指定橢圓曲線密碼編譯 (ECC) 金鑰的公開金鑰 BLOB，其中含有明確的曲線參數。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a public key BLOB for an elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) key which contains explicit curve parameters.

span.span: An object describing a public key BLOB.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property EccPrivateBlob As CngKeyBlobFormat

summary.span: 取得 物件，指定 Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC) 金鑰的私密金鑰 BLOB。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a private key BLOB for an elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) key.

value.span: 指定 ECC 私密金鑰 BLOB 的物件。

span.span: An object that specifies an ECC private key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ECC 私用金鑰 BLOB 格式包含 ECC 金鑰的公用和私用部分。The ECC private key BLOB format contains both the public and private portions of an ECC key.

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a public key BLOB for an elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) key.

value.span: 指定 ECC 公開金鑰 BLOB 的物件。

span.span: An object that specifies an ECC public key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ECC 公用金鑰 BLOB 格式包含 ECC 金鑰的公開部分。The ECC public key BLOB format contains only the public portion of an ECC key.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GenericPrivateBlob As CngKeyBlobFormat

summary.span: 取得 物件，指定泛型私密金鑰 BLOB。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a generic private key BLOB.

value.span: 指定泛型私密金鑰 BLOB 的物件。

span.span: An object that specifies a generic private key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型私用金鑰 BLOB 可包含任何類型的私密金鑰，且不一定會包含對應的公開金鑰。A generic private key BLOB can contain a private key of any type and does not necessarily contain the corresponding public key. 包含 BLOB 的索引鍵的類型可以決定只是藉由檢查 BLOB。The type of key that the BLOB contains can be determined only by examining the BLOB.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GenericPublicBlob As CngKeyBlobFormat

summary.span: 取得 物件，指定泛型公開金鑰 BLOB。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a generic public key BLOB.

value.span: 指定泛型公開金鑰 BLOB 的物件。

span.span: An object that specifies a generic public key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型的公開金鑰 BLOB 可包含任何類型的公開金鑰。A generic public key BLOB can contain a public key of any type. BLOB 包含公開金鑰的類型可以決定只是藉由檢查 BLOB。The type of public key that the BLOB contains can be determined only by examining the BLOB.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property OpaqueTransportBlob As CngKeyBlobFormat

summary.span: 取得 物件，指定不透明傳輸金鑰 BLOB。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies an opaque transport key BLOB.

value.span: 指定不透明傳輸金鑰 BLOB 的物件。

span.span: An object that specifies an opaque transport key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不透明的傳輸金鑰 BLOB 格式是由，而且與每個金鑰儲存提供者相關聯。The format of an opaque transport key BLOB is determined by, and associated with, each key storage provider. 匯入和匯出不透明的傳輸格式中的索引鍵需要這兩個作業使用相同的金鑰儲存提供者。Importing and exporting a key in opaque transport format requires using the same key storage provider for both operations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Pkcs8PrivateBlob As CngKeyBlobFormat

summary.span: 取得 物件，指定 Private Key Information Syntax Standard (PKCS #8) 金鑰 BLOB。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a Private Key Information Syntax Standard (PKCS #8) key BLOB.

value.span: 指定 PKCS #8 私密金鑰 BLOB 的物件。

span.span: An object that specifies a PKCS #8 private key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks PKCS #8 私用金鑰 BLOB 包含 PKCS #8 格式的私人和公用金鑰內容。A PKCS #8 private key BLOB contains both private and public key material in PKCS #8 format.
